message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a premium price of $14,000. I believe in its value, but I'm happy to discuss further if you have any thoughts.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value to me. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
Thank you for considering my situation, Alice. I truly value the product, but I am unable to exceed my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $11,000?
